subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Highlights: Several tightly knit clusters of venues will dot downtown, with the focus on a redeveloped shoreline of Tokyo Bay. The Olympic village will be built on the water. The city has one of the most efficient public transportation systems in the world. Last June, the bid finished first in the I.O.C.’s technical evaluation.
